author: manoj
msg: USE_FCNTL_SERIALIZE requires fcntl.h on Solaris, but it doesn't need
sys/file.h. Untested on Solaris, but APR compiles on Linux with both

author: manoj
msg: Move ap_pregcomp and ap_pregfree from APR to Apache proper, since these
functions depend on Apache's regex libraries. This also should fix
compilation on platforms not using hsregex.

author: manoj
msg: Put back the regex_cleanup that was taken out by accident

author: rbb
msg: Allow APR locks to do more than just straight mutex.  Only mutex is
implemented, but at least now we can add different kinds of locks later.
